title: Pretty Bitches
description: Emberly Landon is one Pretty Bitch. At least that’s how she’s known in all of Manhattan. One-night stands and kinky sex are all she is capable of maintaining and all she wants give. Her job with Vogue is her life and anything else is a menial.She trolls the city seeking the male distraction not knowing that what she’s really missing is love, that she’s never had. A chance meeting with a Scottish stud, Cailen Carmichael unravels her ties to Scotland and everything she has tried so hard to keep buried. They quickly find out they are tied together with the most horrific memory of her past.He sees beneath her Bitch of Arms shell and helps her find the closure she needs to put her tragedy behind her. The sex is explosive and connecting, something neither was expecting and it shows them what they’ve both been missing without each other. Two lost damaged souls find love they never had.When his past demons come back and set a target on her he makes a choice to leave the only woman that he has ever loved to protect her from him and his demons. But what he doesn’t know is that Emberly Landon is a fighter and she’s not giving up.
author: April E.
